description: Founded in 2001, Mensinger Painting has been painting the Hazleton area and surrounding areas for over 10 years.  I started off working for my grandfather when i was in High School and College and then decided to open my own business.  We offer all types of painting from interior to exterior to residential to commercial, we do it all.  A large portion of work we do is residential repaints but it use to be new construction, due to the economy.  We will always be number one due to our great customer service and reasonable pricing.

Pride Painting & Spackling is Nassau County's number 1 source for all your painting, spackling, and power washing needs! With over 15 years of experience in the business and competitive pricing, it should be an easy choice in deciding who to call when you're in need of painting, spackling, or power washing services. WE TAKE PRIDE IN OUR WORK.
slogan: Nassau County's #1 source for painting, spackling and power washing!

description: J J & M Painting is a Residential and Commercial Painting Contracting Company

Since 1991, William Whamond has been successfully transforming people’s houses into family homes. Quality always has remained number one but cost efficiency, care, and satisfaction drive the core of this company. William Whamond personally works with ALL of his customers to ensure personal satisfaction…from color coordinating to personal interior decorating, William Whamond can complete it all!
 
We provide a written satisfaction guarantee for all services provided.William Whamond is also verified and found on Angieslist, a referral company where we are ‘A’ rated AND part of the Honor Roll®!! We even were awarded the 2012 Super Service Award, how’s that for a great company?

Brighthouse Painting was started in Middletown, NJ in 2005. Owner, Kyle Gesuelli, began painting houses for friends of family in his time off during high school. He quickly discovered his talent for painting and grew his business to several employees, painting homes all across NJ and PA. He has an eye for detail and is focused on customer satisfaction.

slogan: Providing quality work at affordable prices.

company_title: We Take Pride In Our Painting
description:
We are a small "owner operated" company, who takes pride in their work. (I'm a perfectionist) We take our time and do an excellent job. Keeping our eye on the little things which makes the difference between a good job and a great job. 

In fact, we do such a professional, eye perfect job, that I guarantee it for one full year. I'll even put it in writing! No other painter will do that. I personally do the work myself with a helper, the old fashioned way and do not send a crew to do it for us. 

If you do it right the first time, it will last for years to come. That's why I can and will guarantee my work for one year! Not only do I guarantee the prep work, (cracks, damage etc) but also the paint job itself. 

Doing a quality job at a fair price for over twenty five years. Very competitive prices. About the same as other good painters. Neat and clean while working. You'll find no sloppy jobs here. We do not get paint on anything, except the walls, ceiling, doors and trim. reliable and dependable. Bonded, fully-insured and lead paint certified.
slogan: We take our time and do excellent work!

description: Enhanced Interior Painting specializes in interior and exterior painting, Venetian plastering, Grotto plastering, Roman painting, and many other types of decorative painting. We are a fully licensed and insured contractor located in New Castle County, Delaware. We also perform work in many areas of Pennsylvania. Our commitment to you is delivering beautiful and high quality results. With over 20 years of experience we guarantee a professional job every time. Give your home the look it deserves!
slogan: Our work will make you say wow!

description: J&S Painting Contractors, Inc. offers a full range of painting, wall covering, flooring and remodeling services for your home or office, inside or outside. With over 28 years of experience, we are North and Central New Jersey's premier choice for remodeling, painting, flooring and other home improvement needs.
Complete Painting and Remodeling  Owner Operated Cedar Siding expert repair ,reside and staining. Serving The Jersey Shore Since 1988
slogan: Trust Your Home Or Business To The Pros

description: Top-of-the-Line Interior and Exterior Painting Services for your home or South Jersey Business. Call for a free and easy quote.
slogan: your best solution for a better looking home!

description: T.C.M. Finishes provides professional interior and exterior painting services throughout West Chester and the surrounding areas. As a life-long West Chester resident, a West Chester University graduate and a honorable Borough resident, I appreciate historical Chester County for its inviting hospitality and small-town charm. T.C.M.’s professional painting services provide distinct color and style to Chester County’s homes and businesses. The overall priority of the company is focusing on each client's needs. By developing excellent customer relationships, our finished projects result in exceptional painting services as well as establishing reputable partnerships between our client and the community.
slogan: Classic Painting and Custom Faux Finishes

description:
Jim Hallman Painting is a full service painting contractor, serving Harrisburg and Lancaster Pennsylvania and the surrounding areas. We have the resources, qualifications, and experience necessary to meet all your residential and commercial painting and power washing needs.

A reliable handyman who assist with the sale of your home or rental is a key dream team member that all real estate investors need. Let me focus on getting your house ready for sale, while you focus on finding great deals. Along with the highest quality painting, I also offer drywall repair, plumbing, electrical, remodeling, hot air furnace replacement (both gas and oil).
slogan: We offer personal service, customized to your needs, on your time schedule

description: Pro Painters Plus LLC is a professional painting firm with a mission to provide you with creative ideas, personal service, and quality products to both beautify and protect your home. We realize that each of our clients’ goals are unique; therefore we take the time upfront to listen to your needs and provide you with customized solutions to not only meet, but exceed your expectations.

We have helped to beautify the community for over 20 years. We pride ourselves on being a company where customer service means timeliness, quality work and a friendly attitude. We think you will appreciate our competitive prices. We are licensed, bonded and insured to handle any of your needs. We will also provide references upon request.
slogan: We deliver professional and timely service, competitive prices and quality workmanship.

license: IN NYC YOU DON'T NEED LIC FOR PAINTING

description:
Reliable Paint is a licensed and insured, Nassau County based contracting company focused on providing elegant and dependable home improvement services. Specifically, we specialize in painting and power-washing both residential homes and commercial properties. We operate in and around the Nassau County area of Long Island, NY and have been doing business long enough - over 25 years - to know how to start a job, do excellent work, and finish on time, all while keeping customers informed and in control of their project's execution.

We understand that dealing with contractors can be a dreadful thing, and that's a shame, but in a lot of cases the trade has earned its reputation. At Reliable paint, we try to do things a bit differently: our goal is to deliver clean, consistent results that satisfy our customer's expectations in exceptional time, and with every job we undertake, we work very hard to achieve that goal. Because of that effort, our business has built an immense amount of lasting relationships with past customers and has been sustained through the majority of its existence by word of mouth recommendations. Ask around your neighborhood; if you live on Long Island, someone near you has likely had a pleasant experience with Reliable Paint, and we'd like for you to as well.
